# Body

**Associated Type**

The transfer representation for the item.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : TransferRepresentation
```

## Implementing a transfer representation

- **body**: A builder expression that describes the process of importing and exporting an item.
- **Item**: The type of the item that’s being transferred.

items.description: A builder expression that describes the process of importing and exporting an item.
items.name: body

items.description: The type of the item that’s being transferred.
